allow: Bash(bash .specify/scripts/bash/create-new-feature.sh "create an todo app with the best ui and backend for my project using next.js, tailwind, typescript and backend with fastapi,  SQLModel, Neon DB this aap should look like a come complete with features to add remove delete and write complete or in complete task it should also be able to create a .txt filr of todos if needed and should give .txt file name of the date that .txt file is crezted on" --number=1 --short-name=todo-app)
Bash(curl -X POST "http://localhost:8000/api/todos/" -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d "{""title"":""Test Todo"",""description"":""This is a test todo item""}")
Bash(curl -X PUT "http://localhost:8000/api/todos/1" -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d "{""title"":""Updated Todo"",""description"":""This is an updated todo item""}")
